20101231014531.000|20101231014533.000|CC1|>> OUR BUSINESS MODEL IS TO     
20101231014533.000|20101231014534.000|CC1|TRANSFORM THESE LOW-VALUE WASTES
20101231014534.000|20101231014536.000|CC1|INTO SOMETHING WITH VALUE.

20101231014539.000|20101231014541.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THEY MIX SEED HUSKS
20101231014541.000|20101231014542.000|CC1|WITH A CULTURED FUNGUS AND POUR

20101231014546.000|20101231014547.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YOU MIX THE

20101231014548.000|20101231014550.000|CC1|HUSKS AND THE MUSHROOM ROOTS    
20101231014550.000|20101231014552.000|CC1|GROW AROUND THE SEED HUSKS AND  
20101231014552.000|20101231014555.000|CC1|BIND IT LIKE A GLUE.            
20101231014555.000|20101231014557.000|CC1|IT'S SPONGY AND IT'S COLD.

20101231014557.000|20101231014558.000|CC1|>> LAST STEP IN OUR PROCESS IS

20101231015355.000|20101231015356.000|CC1|U.S.A. FOUNDATION, DONATIONS TO 
20101231015356.000|20101231015357.000|CC1|ARTS, CULTURE AND HUMANITIES

20101231015400.000|20101231015404.000|CC1|2.5% TO $12.3 BILLION LAST YEAR.

20101231015405.000|20101231015406.000|CC1|FOUNDATIONS ALSO DOWN, CLASS    
20101231015406.000|20101231015411.000|CC1|ACTS ARTS MADE SACRIFICES.      
20101231015411.000|20101231015412.000|CC1|>> WE UNFORTUNATELY HAD TO TAKE

20101231015419.000|20101231015421.000|CC1|LAST YEAR.                      
20101231015421.000|20101231015421.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE OTHER          
20101231015421.000|20101231015422.000|CC1|CONSEQUENCE WHEN ARTS NONPROFITS
20101231015422.000|20101231015424.000|CC1|LOSE MONEY IS THE IMPACT ON     
20101231015424.000|20101231015427.000|CC1|ARTISTS THEMSELVES.             
20101231015427.000|20101231015427.000|CC1|PEOPLE PERFORMING FOR AND       
20101231015427.000|20101231015429.000|CC1|TEACHING THE DISADVANTAGED MAY  
20101231015429.000|20101231015431.000|CC1|ALSO BE HAVING TROUBLE MAKING   
20101231015431.000|20101231015432.000|CC1|ENDS MEET.                      
20101231015432.000|20101231015435.000|CC1|BUT THERE IS ONE BRIGHT SPOT.   
20101231015435.000|20101231015437.000|CC1|PALMER SAYS AFFLUENT PEOPLE HAVE
20101231015437.000|20101231015437.000|CC1|RECOGNIZED THE ARTS ARE         
20101231015437.000|20101231015438.000|CC1|SUFFERING, AND THEY HAVEN'T     
20101231015438.000|20101231015440.000|CC1|STOPPED GIVING.                 
20101231015440.000|20101231015442.000|CC1|OVER 70% OF HIGH-NET-WORTH      
20101231015442.000|20101231015443.000|CC1|HOUSEHOLDS GAVE DIRECTLY TO ARTS
20101231015443.000|20101231015446.000|CC1|NONPROFITS IN THE LAST YEAR.    
20101231015446.000|20101231015448.000|CC1|>> IT'S BEEN HELPFUL TO MANY    
20101231015448.000|20101231015449.000|CC1|ORGANIZATIONS, AND I THINK

20101231015455.000|20101231015456.000|CC1|>> Reporter: STILL, THE NUMBER  
20101231015456.000|20101231015458.000|CC1|OF PEOPLE WHO SAY THEY'RE NOT   
20101231015458.000|20101231015458.000|CC1|GIVING TO CHARITIES AT ALL HAS  
20101231015458.000|20101231015503.000|CC1|DOUBLED OVER THE PAST YEAR.     
20101231015503.000|20101231015505.000|CC1|BURNS IS TRYING TO STAY         
20101231015505.000|20101231015506.000|CC1|OPTIMISTIC, MAKING THE CASE THAT
20101231015506.000|20101231015509.000|CC1|ORGANIZATIONS LIKE HERS ARE     
20101231015509.000|20101231015510.000|CC1|ESSENTIAL.                      
20101231015510.000|20101231015510.000|CC1|>> CLEARLY THE PRIORITIES NEED  
20101231015510.000|20101231015511.000|CC1|TO BE THERE, BUT WE FEED THE
